summary: Completed frontend testing of ticket printing functionality in AlpineFlow Caja (Cash Register) module. All 6 test cases passed successfully.

design_issues.issue: Console warning: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent - accessibility improvement recommended

passed_tests: 1. Caja page (/caja) loads correctly with movements of the day - PASSED
2. Each movement row has a visible printer icon - PASSED (11 printer buttons found)
3. Clicking printer icon opens ticket preview dialog - PASSED
4. Print button in dialog opens print window - PASSED (popup window opened)
5. Creating new movement (Nueva Entrada) shows ticket dialog automatically - PASSED
6. Creating new expense (Nueva Salida) shows ticket dialog with SALIDA badge - PASSED
7. Settings page (/configuracion) loads with auto-print toggle - PASSED
8. Auto-print toggle works and shows toast notification - PASSED

auto_ticket_on_create.nueva_entrada: WORKING - Dialog appears automatically after creating entry
auto_ticket_on_create.nueva_salida: WORKING - Dialog appears automatically after creating expense

critical_code_review_comments: Minor: Add DialogDescription to dialogs to fix accessibility warning (aria-describedby)
seed_data_creation: Created 2 test movements: 'Test ticket printing' (+€25.50) and 'Test expense ticket' (-€15.00)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Ticket printing functionality fully tested and working. The Caja page has printer icons on each movement row, clicking opens a preview dialog, and the Print button opens a new window with thermal ticket format. New movements automatically show the ticket dialog after creation. Settings page has working auto-print toggle that persists to localStorage.
